SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.connection

Class TCPReceiver

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.connection.TCPReceiver
public class TCPReceiver extends Object
The `TCPReceiver` class is responsible for receiving and handling TCP messages from the server in the client-side application. It deserializes the received messages and forwards them to the appropriate methods in the `Client` class for further processing. The class uses the Gson library to deserialize JSON messages into their corresponding Java objects.
